body: To determine the source of your motivation for the conflict, roll on the table below. If the campaign allows the full spectrum of alignments, roll a d10 on this table. If the campaign allows only nonevil alignments, roll a d8. If you're a paladin, roll a d4. The motivation affects the CP gained from the conflict.
name: Conflict Motivation
